Net primary productivity in China for 1981â€“2010 and its standard deviation distribution. ( a) 30-year mean NPP. ( b) NPP standard deviation. Note that black spots in ( a) indicate field sites. The field sites data were obtained from the Global Primary Production Data Initiative Products database
70 . The figure was generated using ArcGIS 10.1 software ( http://www.esri.com/).
